notes: Mapping satisfies: 7 N12 size-4 blocks -> 7 disjoint W33 lines; 3 N12 size-2 blocks -> 3 collinear pairs; remaining 6 points -> remaining 6 W33 points.
Loop realization cost is computed as: for each 2T cycle, minimal number of cover-12 triads needed in a closed walk through the four-center triad adjacency graph.
